Title: Eggs for Days
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Lizzie Molyneux, Wendy Molyneux
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: At the annual Easter egg hunt, Bob and Linda have a little too much fun hiding the eggs, so the Belchers race to find the one egg rotting in its hiding place.
